General.Name: Dongil Steel Co. Ltd
General.Description: Dongil Steel Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells iron and steel products for various industries in South Korea. It offers cold drawn steel round, square, hexagonal, and rectangular bars. The company also provides hot rolled steel round and square bars; angle products, such as angle and rolling shape steel products; and channels. It exports its products to the United States, Southeast Asia, and the Middle East Asian countries. Dongil Steel Co., Ltd. was founded in 1967 and is based in Busan, South Korea.

1.Name: Jong-Ho  Yoon
1.Title: Chief Financial Officer and Managing Director
